bibdata.title: IEEE/ISO/IEC International Standard
Information technology-Telecommunications and information exchange between systems
Local and metropolitan area networks-Specific requirements Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications Amendment 1: Fast Initial Link Setup

IEEE/ISO/IEC International Standard - Information technology-Telecommunications and information exchange between systems - Local and metropolitan area networks-Specific requirements Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications Amendment 1: Fast Initial Link Setup

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Mechanisms that provide IEEE Std 802.11 networks with fast initial link setup methods that do not degrade the security offered by Robust Security Network Association (RSNA) already defined in IEEE Std 802.11 are defined in this amendment.

Mechanisms that provide IEEE Std 802.11 networks with fast initial link setup methods that do not degrade the security offered by Robust Security Network Association (RSNA) already defined in IEEE Std 802.11 are defined in this amendment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
